Actions.Name: Add comment
Actions.Description: This operation is used to add a comment to an existing JIRA issue.

Actions.Name: Cancel Task
Actions.Description: Cancels a task. Permissions required: either of: Administer Jira or Creator of the task.

Actions.Name: Create a new issue [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Create a new issue (V2) instead.
This operation is used to create a new issue.

Actions.Name: Create a new issue (V2)
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new issue.

Actions.Name: Create a new project
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create a new JIRA project.

Actions.Name: Create Project Category
Actions.Description: Creates a project category. Permissions required: Administer Jira (global permissions)

Actions.Name: Delete Project
Actions.Description: Deletes a project. Permissions required: Administer Jira (global permissions)

Actions.Name: Edit Issue
Actions.Description: Edits an issue. A transition may be applied and issue properties updated as part of the edit. The edits to the issue's fields are defined using update and fields.

Actions.Name: Get All Project Categories
Actions.Description: Returns all project categories.

Actions.Name: Get issue by key
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve the issue object for a given issue Key.

Actions.Name: Get Task
Actions.Description: Returns the status of a long-running asynchronous task. When a task has finished, this operation returns the JSON blob applicable to the task.

Actions.Name: Get User
Actions.Description: Returns a user. Permissions required: Browse users and groups.

Actions.Name: Get projects [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get projects instead.
This operation is used to retrieve a list of projects for your JIRA instance.

Actions.Name: Get projects
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve a list of projects for your JIRA instance.

Actions.Name: List users by project
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve a list of all users associated with a project.

Actions.Name: When an issue is closed
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when an existing issue is closed in the given project.

Actions.Name: When a new issue is created
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new issue is added to the given project.

Actions.Name: When a new issue is returned by a JQL query
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new issue appears in the latest 100 results of a JQL query.

Actions.Name: Remove Project Category
Actions.Description: Deletes a project category. Permissions required: Administer Jira (global permissions)

Actions.Name: Update Project
Actions.Description: Updates the project details of a project.
